events.description: The release of construction output data for the Czech Republic for the month of December 2025.

facts.fact_text: Czech construction output rose by 5.3% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Construction output in the Czech Republic rose by 5.3% year-on-year in December 2025

facts.fact_text: The value of building permits granted in December was CZK 36 billion, a 54.7% year-on-year increase.

evidences.evidence_text: The approximate value of building permits granted surged by 54.7% year-on-year to CZK 36 billion in December.

facts.fact_text: Completed dwellings increased by 56.1% to 2,988 units.
Civil engineering output grew by 10.9% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: Meanwhile, output grew in civil engineering works (10.9% vs 3.3%).

claims.claim_text: Growth in building constructions slowed sharply in December compared to November.

evidences.evidence_text: Growth slowed sharply in building constructions (2.3% vs 8.1% in November).

claims.claim_text: Construction output growth eased from the previous month's revised figures.

evidences.evidence_text: easing from an upwardly revised 6.2% increase in the previous month.

evidence.evidence_text: Construction output in the Czech Republic rose by 5.3% year-on-year in December 2025
Meanwhile, output grew in civil engineering works (10.9% vs 3.3%).
The approximate value of building permits granted surged by 54.7% year-on-year to CZK 36 billion in December.
